div.h1: Brilla Public Charter Schools, K-8 Schools in the classical tradition, help students to grow intellectually, socially, and physically into young men and women of good character and spirit, and to be prepared for excellence in high school, college and beyond. Learn more.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-d76323b elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

community school district and

In both ELA and math,
Brilla was the THIRD highest
performing school out of all
New York state elementary
schools serving a similar
composition of children.

div.p: Students are proficient in Math and ELA State Tests.
Parents report their students meet or exceed (>4.0 average) in at least 5 of 7 character benchmarks.
Graduating 8th grade students meet Truth-Beauty-Goodness portfolio requirements.
Top quartile ranking in Gallup Q12 staff survey.

div.p: Brilla Public Charter Schools is committed to equal treatment for all individuals. Brilla College Prep does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, gender, disability, age, religion, sexual orientation, or national or ethnic origin. Copyright © 2019 Brilla College Prep. All rights reserved.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-1cc646a1 brillapop elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

h5.a: Brilla Schools will be closed until May 15th.

div.p: To do remote learning, click here.

Click here to access resources that may help you during this difficult time including information about “Grab and Go” meals, food vouchers, and other resources to help you economically and emotionally.

h5.a: Las escuelas de Brilla estarán cerradas hasta el 15 de mayo.

div.p: Para hacer el aprendizaje remoto, clic aquí.

Clic aquí para acceder a los recursos que pueden ayudarle durante estos tiempos difíciles, incluyendo información sobre comidas “Grab and Go”, cupones de alimentos y otros recursos que puedan ayudarle económicamente y emocionalmente
